ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, "Onboarding Complete")&& ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, "New Case")&& ( ( (ISBLANK(Infopath_Received__c) || ISBLANK(Set_up_complete_email_received__c) || Policy_Type_Total_of_EEs__c < 1 || Carrier_Other_Count__c > 0)
) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must resolve any Open Items, Sales Submission items, InfoPath Received, Set up Complete email received and Policy items: Total # of EEs and Carriers before the Current Step can be changed to Onboarding Complete
